# Discretization

```@docs
discretize
DiscretizationMethod
```

## Methods

Below is the list of currently implemented discretization methods.

### FIST

```@docs
FIST
```

```@example FIST
using Meshes
using Plots
gr(size = (500,300)) # hide

# polygonal area
polyarea = PolyArea([(0.16687596, 0.6763949), (0.63792515, 0.20132281), (0.92808944, 0.52010834), (0.95507824, 0.53952533), (0.9225352, 0.5166371), (0.8190737, 0.5040926), (0.7926518, 0.5494572), (0.74116296, 0.5993454), (0.79804873, 0.5519731), (0.85590965, 0.6494151), (0.49462578, 0.93649143), (0.47591516, 0.98907244), (0.46890727, 0.90921813), (0.36027902, 0.99050534), (0.33441278, 0.9391666), (0.16687596, 0.6763949)])

mesh = discretize(polyarea, FIST())

plot(plot(polyarea), plot(mesh))
```

As can be seen in the following example, FIST is also suitable for polygonal areas with holes.

```@example FIST
outer = [(0.20974362, 0.11143557), (0.24619843, 0.019633872), (0.2525517, 0.10491638), (0.2605699, 0.03590731), (0.2794662, 0.009585844), (0.5437957, 0.24153952), (0.6285009, 0.21651964), (0.6449456, 0.2147006), (0.59213245, 0.26681182), (0.8229673, 0.74253976), (0.65908766, 0.56879747), (0.5620604, 0.53223926), (0.749698, 0.8314047), (0.75198966, 0.9489501), (0.7027816, 0.92791766), (0.7210894, 0.8686051), (0.65642047, 0.9434703), (0.6423689, 0.9363239), (0.549272, 0.9676014), (0.23183312, 0.71278405), (0.20974362, 0.11143557)] # hide

inners = [[(0.52954125, 0.5394655), (0.23878936, 0.1011955), (0.22548631, 0.09457563), (0.2759589, 0.71809477), (0.5383939, 0.85454345), (0.6496192, 0.9248424), (0.6248543, 0.8470848), (0.52954125, 0.5394655)], [(0.54061747, 0.2523168), (0.5210726, 0.27176696), (0.55140936, 0.29682124), (0.54061747, 0.2523168)]] # hide

polyarea = PolyArea(outer, inners) # hide

mesh = discretize(polyarea, FIST()) # hide

plot(plot(polyarea), plot(mesh)) # hide
```
